<a href="https://gl-li.shinyapps.io/nextWord_ShinyApp" target="_blank"><h4>Predict next words</h4></a>  

This is the capstone project of online course
<a href="https://www.coursera.org/specializations/jhudatascience" target = "blank">Data Science Specialization</a> offered by Johns Hopkins University. In this project we build a web application to predict the next words following each keystroke. This kind of applications have been widely used for text input in mobile devices such as cell phones and tablets.
